程序包 com.personalfinance.view.component

类 CurrencyTextField

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.awt.Component
      • java.awt.Container
        • javax.swing.JComponent
          • javax.swing.text.JTextComponent
            • javax.swing.JTextField
              • javax.swing.JFormattedTextField
                • com.personalfinance.view.component.CurrencyTextField

  • public class CurrencyTextField
extends javax.swing.JFormattedTextField
    A custom formatted text field for currency input.

    This component supports decimal input formatted to two decimal places, disallows invalid values, and provides convenient methods to get and set the amount as BigDecimal.

    另请参阅:

    • 构造器详细资料

      • CurrencyTextField

        public CurrencyTextField​()
        Constructs a new CurrencyTextField with default formatting.

        The field displays numbers with two decimal places, right-aligned, with a default value of 0.00. Invalid input is disallowed.

    • 方法详细资料

      • getAmount

        public java.math.BigDecimal getAmount​()
                               throws java.text.ParseException
        Returns the current amount entered in the text field as a BigDecimal.
        返回:
        the current amount, or BigDecimal.ZERO if parsing fails
        抛出:
        java.text.ParseException - if the current input cannot be parsed

      • setAmount

        public void setAmount​(java.math.BigDecimal amount)
        Sets the amount displayed in the text field.
        参数:
        amount - the BigDecimal value to display; if null, sets to 0.00

      • setValue

        public void setValue​(java.lang.Object value)
        Overrides the default setValue to ensure BigDecimal is properly handled.
        覆盖:
        setValue 在类中 javax.swing.JFormattedTextField
        参数:
        value - the value to set; can be BigDecimal or any other supported type
